TopicTitle: 0.25 & Beta Realistic Stock Space Shuttle Mission

Articles.Content:
I made a stock space shuttle using the rotation editors in Beta and made the craft file work on 0.25 so I could share it. Here is a common mission and tutorial on how to fly it!

This is a simple stock space shuttle with working OMS and other accurate flight characteristics. Aim a little towards the East at launch and the boosters will lean you towards 45 degrees as they burn out. Separate boosters and burn through main tank to 100km apoapsis. Use OMS for orbital insertion, maneuvering, and reentry. Seats two kerbals.

The shuttle flies easy!

0.25 Craft File
